languages.text: "Думаете, маска безалаберного {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} защитит от обвинения в ереси? Ваша вера в то, что я являюсь неосведомленным идиотом, весьма прискорбна".

traits.locale_text: "Это ложь. Не знаю, что меня печалит больше, ваше неверие в мою осведомленность или ваша вера в то, что я — идиот".

languages.text: "You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."
languages.original_text: "Думаете, маска безалаберного {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} защитит от обвинения в ереси? Ваша вера в то, что я являюсь неосведомленным идиотом, весьма прискорбна".

traits.locale_text: "You think that wearing the mask of a slovenly Rogue Trader will protect you from being accused of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed idiot is quite regrettable."
"You think that wearing the mask of a slovenly Rogue Trader will protect you from being accused of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed idiot is quite regrettable."
"You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."
"You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."
"You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."

languages.text: 「無能な{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の皮を被れば、異端者と訴えられることはないとでも？私を無知な愚者と考えているなら、誠に遺憾だ」
languages.original_text: "You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."

traits.locale_text: 「無能な{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の皮を被れば、異端者と訴えられることはないとでも？私を無知な愚者と考えているなら、誠に遺憾だ」

languages.original_text: "You think donning the mask of a feckless Rogue Trader will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，你以为摆出一副事不关己的样子就能逃脱异端指控吗？如果你把我当成毫不知情的傻子，这恐怕就太让人遗憾了。”
languages.original_text: "You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，你以为摆出一副事不关己的样子就能逃脱异端指控吗？如果你把我当成毫不知情的傻子，这恐怕就太让人遗憾了。”

languages.text: «¿Cree que fingiendo ser un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} incompetente le protegerá contra acusaciones de herejía? Lamentablemente, se equivoca si cree que estoy así de mal informado».
languages.original_text: "You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cree que fingiendo ser un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} incompetente le protegerá contra acusaciones de herejía? Lamentablemente, se equivoca si cree que estoy así de mal informado».

languages.text: « Vous espérez échapper aux accusations d'hérésie en jouant {mf|au|à la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} {mf|bon à rien|bonne à rien} ? Me croyez-vous si naïf, ou si mal informé ? Ce serait fort regrettable. »
languages.original_text: "You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."

traits.locale_text: « Vous espérez échapper aux accusations d'hérésie en jouant {mf|au libre-marchand bon à rien|à la libre-marchande bonne à rien} ? Me croyez-vous si naïf, ou si mal informé ? Ce serait fort regrettable. »

languages.text: "Meint Ihr, die Maske {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|eines inkompetenten Freihändlers|eine inkompetenten Freihändlerin}{/g} schützt Euch gegen Vorwürfe der Ketzerei? Eure Meinung, ich sei ein schlecht informierter Trottel, ist überaus betrüblich."
languages.original_text: "You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."

traits.locale_text: "Meint Ihr, die Maske {mf|eines inkompetenten Freihändlers|eine inkompetenten Freihändlerin} schützt Euch gegen Vorwürfe der Ketzerei? Eure Meinung, ich sei ein schlecht informierter Trottel, ist überaus betrüblich."

languages.text: "Dikkatsiz bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} maskesi takmak, seni kâfirlik suçlamalarından korur mu sanıyorsun? Benim cahil bir sersem olduğuma dair inancın, gerçekten üzüntü verici."
languages.original_text: "You think donning the mask of a feckless {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} will shield you against accusations of heresy? Your belief that I am an uninformed fool is quite regrettable."

traits.locale_text: "Dikkatsiz bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} maskesi takmak seni kâfirlik suçlamalarına karşı korur mu sanıyorsun? Benim cahil bir sersem olduğuma dair inancın gerçekten üzüntü verici."
